site.description: Central Update Site for WUDSN IDE

category-def.name: WUDSN IDE
category-def.label: WUDSN IDE
category-def.description: The free integrated Apple II, Atari VCS, Atari 8-bit, C64 and NES development plugin.

category-def.name: General
category-def.label: General Eclipse Enhancements
category-def.description: General Eclipse Enhancements. Do not install if you already have WUDSN IDE installed. WUDSN IDE already contains all features included in this category.
